attributes.action: Help free the innocent bear Muhammad and let the bear get the freedom it deserves!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gillian Gibbons may be free after naming the ill fated bear "Muhammad" but sadly the actual innocent bear in all this will be locked up for the rest of it's life.Suffering from lack of food,a poor sleep pattern and worse of all the fate of execution.

So please sign the government petition here and encourage the British government to get the freedom it deserves.


FREE Muhammad the bear!!!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
